short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scrape and decode X.509 certificates directly from metadata files.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Troubleshooting SAML-based single sign-on connections often requires deciphering X.509 certificate data. Traditional methods of copying and pasting information into web pages can be cumbersome. XML SAML Certificate Decoder provides a streamlined solution, enabling you to quickly and easily decode SAML signing certificates directly from metadata files.
